title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2724/91 of 16 September 1991 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products of category 101 (order No 40.1010), originating in India, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3832/90 apply
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2724/91  of 16 September 1991  re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products of category 101 (order No 40.1010), originating in India, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council  Regulation (EEC) No 3832/90 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As from 20 September 1991 the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 3832/90, shall be re-establish in respect of the following products, imported into the Community and originating in India:
Order No  Category
(unit)  CN code  Description           40.1010  101
(tonnes)  ex 5607 90 00  Twine, cordage, ropes and cables, plaited or not, other than of synthetic fibres

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 September 1991. For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 370, 31. 12. 1990, p. 39.
